Package io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.cfg

Class ContentType

java.lang.Object
io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.cfg.ContentType
public class ContentType extends Object
A content-type representation. Some standard content-types are provided as static constants for use elsewhere, others may be created as instances of this class as needed.

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ContentType(String value)
    Creates a content-type with the specified value.
    ContentType(String value, String charset)
    Creates a content-type with the specified value and charset (as [content-type]; charset=[charset]).

  • Constructor Details

    • ContentType

      public ContentType(String value)
      Creates a content-type with the specified value.
      Parameters:
      value - the content-type value

    • ContentType

      public ContentType(String value, String charset)
      Creates a content-type with the specified value and charset (as [content-type]; charset=[charset]).
      Parameters:
      value - the content-type value
      charset - the content-type charset

  • Method Details

    • getValue

      public String getValue()
      Used to retrieve the value of the content-type.
      Returns:
      the String value of the content-type

    • withCharset

      public ContentType withCharset(String charset)
      Creates a new ContentType object from this one with the specified "charset" appended to it.
      Parameters:
      charset - the charset to be applied
      Returns:
      the content-type and charset wrapped in a ContentType object

    • withCharset

      public ContentType withCharset(Charset charset)
      Creates a new ContentType object from this one with the specified "charset" appended to it.
      Parameters:
      charset - the charset to be applied
      Returns:
      the content-type and charset wrapped in a ContentType object
